description:
Instagram deploys code 40 times a day to its fleet of thousands of webservers and userbase of 400M monthly active users automatically when engineers land changes.
This talk describes the iterative approach we took to building this system, the problems we faced along the way, the solutions we implemented, and the key principles which enable this to work.

videos.title: Michael Gorven - Continuous deployment to millions of users 40 times a day

title: Michael Gorven - Continuous deployment to millions of users 40 times a day
